attributes.action: Make supermarkets change reduced products to half the price of normal
attributes.additional_details: Supermarkets are unfair with their reduced products sometimes knocking off less than a pound when it's in the clearence section on its last date of use.
attributes.background: I want the government to enforce that supermarkets should reduced their clearence products by half the original price when it is on its last date.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about any price reductions are a matter for individual retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
